scripts.dev:manual: concurrently --prefix="[{name}]" --names="services,backend,worker,frontend" --prefix-colors="cyan,green,yellow,blue" "npm run dev:services" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:worker" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:services: npm run start:redis && npm run start:aria2
scripts.start:redis: redis-server --daemonize yes || echo 'Redis déjà démarré ou non installé'
scripts.start:aria2: aria2c --enable-rpc --rpc-listen-all=false --rpc-listen-port=6800 --rpc-secret=dev-secret --daemon || echo 'aria2 déjà démarré ou non installé'
scripts.stop:services: pkill redis-server || true && pkill aria2c || true
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.check:services: echo 'Redis:' && (pgrep redis-server > /dev/null && echo '✅ Running' || echo '❌ Not running') && echo 'aria2:' && (pgrep aria2c > /dev/null && echo '✅ Running' || echo '❌ Not running')
